statements: DELETE FROM travel_expenditures WHERE report_id = 101 AND report_name = 'Business Trip';
DELETE FROM travel_expenditures WHERE spending_category = 'Accommodation' AND expense_date = '2022-05-15';
DELETE FROM budget_limits WHERE budget_limit > 5000 AND year = 2022;
DELETE FROM travel_expenditures WHERE id = 100 AND department = 'Marketing';
DELETE FROM budget_limits WHERE year = 2022 AND department = 'Finance' AND budget_limit < 50000;
DELETE FROM travel_expenses WHERE employee_id = 101 AND expense_date <= '2022-06-30';
DELETE FROM travel_expenses WHERE report_id = 100 AND employee_id = 500;
DELETE FROM budget_limits WHERE category = 'Transportation' AND monthly_limit < 1000.00;
DELETE FROM expenses WHERE report_id = 200 AND expense_date < '2022-01-01';
